entry.title: Thursday: Increasing cloudiness. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 20 April 2023
